settings.title: HomeWizard settings
settings.intro: To connect to your HomeWizard we need the settings below.
settings.heatlink_intro: To connect to your Heatlink we need to know to which HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.energylink_intro: To connect to your Energylink we need to know to which HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.wattcher_intro: To connect to your Wattcher we need to know to which HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.thermometer_intro: To connect to your thermometer we need to know to which HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.use_ledring_explain: Ledring lights up green when preset switched successful, red when not successful
settings.no_ip: Please enter the HomeWizard's IP address

pair.authorize_instruction: Press the button on the device to complete the pairing
pair.authorize_failed_no_button_pressed: Pairing failed, the button was not pressed. Make sure the button is pressed within 60 seconds.
pair.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong, please try again:

energy_v2.authorize_instruction: Press the button on the P1 Meter to complete the pairing

plugin_battery.authorize_instruction: Press the button on the Plugin Battery to complete the pairing

SDM230_v2.authorize_instruction: Press the button on the KWH Meter to complete the pairing

SDM630_v2.authorize_instruction: Press the button on the KWH Meter to complete the pairing
